posts.postText:

Reason: "Blah"

Who banned you?: Flame
Why should we unban you?: Reason is not valid, and through steam, I learned I was banned because of "Some kind of RDM" where LJ and I were t's and as we trapped an innocent into a room, I sprayed (as usual) and killed LJ and the innocent in the process, I apoligized after the round for team killing LJ, as it was an accident.
